input.sentences: it 's a wet day but fans still attend the game .
the camera crew dressed in rain gear .
the stands are full of cheering fans .
the conductor leads the band in a fight song .
output.sentences: It was wet but the game fans stood in line anyway.
They had brought their rain gear and were dressed for the occasion.
The fans stood in the stands, cheering.
The marching band plays their favorite fight song.
The song leads the fight for yet another point.
